definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 5:b. II. [[אבל]]: etym. conject. very dub.; connex. (Lag.) of 0’abala withstand, with 0’ubulun herbage, forage (sts. dry) improb., and of latter with 0’ibilun herd of camels obscure; √ mng. grow green unattested; Syr. yibel, yablo0, Talm. [[יַבְלָא]], Pun. iebal, ‘grass,’ appar. = a specific kind of fodder, a)/grwstiv, v. Löw:No. 141 (GFM, privately).
